DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to investigate aspects of brown fat in scanner with injection via the PET-CT study.
DOC.brief_title: Description of the Appearance of Brown Fat in Scanner
DOC.detailed_description: Brown fat is metabolically active adipose tissue. It can be responsible in PET-CT of a fixation of 18-FDG and a look of pseudo-infiltration of fat. These aspects can be sources of false positives. The objective here is to gain a better knowledge of the scanner in areas of brown fat.
DOC.criteria: Consecutive patients since June 2014, who underwent a thoracoabdominopelvic PETCT examination with 18FFDG in the University Hospital of Brest, in a clinical setting which warranted. Major Patients No opposition formalized Refusal of participation
